original_text: Look! Tomorrow at this time, I will send a very great storm of hail. Nobody has ever seen hail fall like this in Egypt before now. From Egypt's first day as a country until today, nobody has seen a storm like this.
korean_text: 내일 이맘때면 내가 무거운 우박을 내리리니 애굽 나라가 세워진 그 날로부터 지금까지 그와 같은 일이 없었더라

sentences.original_text: I will send a very great storm of hail.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 매우 큰 우박 폭풍을 보내리라.

sentences.original_text: Nobody has ever seen hail fall like this
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 이런 우박이 내리는 것을 본 적이 없다

sentences.original_text: From Egypt's first day as a country
nobody has seen a storm like this.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 이런 폭풍을 본 적이 없다.
